column5: a person climbs a ladder, pauses at the top with a feeling of accomplishment, holds on to the ladder, steps back down 3 steps, then, holding the ladder, lets his body hang before climbing down the ladder and walking to the left.

column1: a person hopping around in a complete circle on one foot, before doing the same with the other foot.
column4: Hop around in a circle with a cheerful attitude.
column5: a person hops around in a complete circle on one foot cheerfully, before doing the same with the other foot.

column1: a person hops on one foot in a circle while switching feet every half circle.
column4: Hop in a circle with a sense of lightheartedness.
column5: a person hops on one foot in a circle with a lighthearted feeling while switching feet every half circle.
